climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 300 GSM FLANNEL FLEECE BLANKET - Our elegantly designed, top-notch quality Flannel Fleece blanket is available in Queen size measuring 90 by 90 inches; the attractive Grey color adds to its luxurious looks
LONG LASTING - This extra warm blanket features two-sided pile and 1-inch hem along with double needle stitching, so it will stay with you for years to come

KEEPS YOU WARM ALL SEASONS - Our super-soft, plush microfiber blanket is perfect for use all year round. It has just the right weight to keep you warm and cozy, yet it’s light enough so you stay comfortable

MULTI-PURPOSE - Throw this over your bed to enjoy a relaxing nap or your living room’s couch while watching your favorite TV show; it’s also your perfect partner for winter camping, backpacking or for use in an air-conditioned room

EASY CARE - Machine washable and dryable for hassle-free care. Machine wash with cold water, tumble dry on low heat. Always wash fleece alone or with other fleece blankets to prevent abrasion; never use bleach

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color, light weight, so soft
reviews.reviewText: I bought the throw to “test drive” before making over my teenaged daughter’s room. I love it! The color is very rich, silky and kind of cool to the touch, thin and warm but not warm enough for winter without another lightweight blanket between it and the sheets. The perfect warmth, size and weight for the couch or outside by the fire. I’ll buy more - they take up way less space than our other throws and feel so much softer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Blanket is Lovely! It’s soft, thin and lightweight. It’s Perfect for Summer! I ordered it in anticipation of the hot Summer months ahead and it’s going to be Perfect when you don’t want something too hot and heavy!! I ordered Pink and what a beautiful pastel pink it is, brightens up my bedroom! This Blanket will wash and dry nicely too! Good Buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Too Light - Just Right - and BEAUTIFUL
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sister and she is delighted at how beautiful and cozy it is -- so am I. This is not a lightweight blanket, nor is it heavy. As I rated, it is just right.The blanket is color-rich and truly beautiful to look at and touch. It is standard blanket size, not a throw, and it perfect for my sister's needs. Of course it is also easy to wash and dry.Sometimes, gift giving is hit-and-miss. This is definitely a gift success.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These blankets are great! They are so soft and warm and are beautiful!! The price is awesome too!! I would highly recommend these to everyone looking for a soft fleece blanket!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color - wanted heavier blanket
reviews.reviewText: Fell in love with the color & the price. Unfortunately, this blanket will now be a summer throw & not for winter like I wanted. It's plush, true color & very well made, just not warm enough for our NC winters! I thought about returning it, but I love the color & feel of this blanket too much to return! It will suit very well in summer to feel warm during cold a/c temps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's a miracle!!!! i can sleep the night through now!
reviews.reviewText: i bought one of these for my mom's house in florida (up north - it was in the 30s-60s F) and call it the "luxury blanket" bc it's so soft and comfortable and cozy. when i went to visit her and used this blanket, that was the first time in a long time i had a full night's sleep. i thought it must be the different bed or the brighter sun regulating my circadian rhythym.and even though i have plenty of blankets, i insisted upon buying this one for our home in ny bc i loved it so much in florida. my hsband protested because we have so many blankets (weighted, crochet, faux fur, down, wool) but ididnt care. this one is special.when i came back to ny, my sleep once again reurned to being beyond abysmal. up in the middle of the night, kicking off sheets, freezing cold, then hot. up for hours in the middle of the night, every night. torture. *our heat isn't working right now, to add to the fun. i ordered the blanket bc i missed how good i felt with it in florida, figuring at least i could feel the softness again. the blanket arrived and i was glad to have that luxury feeling again buti didn not expect what was to happen.i slept with it last night and woke up at 6.30 am like a normal person - i slept the entire night through wihout waking up once!!!!!!! it's a miracle. and it's JUST bc of this blanket - i guess it regulated my temperature perfectly. we literally have no heat right now and it kepy me warm but not too warm - just perfect. it's lightweight, thin, not heavy, just perfect. and so so so very soft.i am going to buy a smaller version for hpostial stays or being on a train, and now my husband wants another one for our other bed. that's a miracle in and of iself because he never wants to buy anything. i did look at other colors and real review pics and i see the orange and burgundy in real life are not as pictured, so i would recommend you look at real review pics. i got th lightblue one and it IS as picured, and next may get yellow.i havent washed this and dont know how it will hold up in the wash. but i will say i feel so, so, grateful to be able to sleep at night without constabtly kicking sheets on and off. literally bc of this blanket, i slept well for the first night and will be able to function during the day again. i had assumed my lack of sleep was bc my bed isn't as comfrtable as the one in florida, but i was wrong. it was the blankets i had (and i tried all of them) not regulating my body temperature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought this blanket to use in my Harrisonburg, Va Airbnb
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice blanket for the money. I use it in my little Airbnb apartment. I like the color and don’t feel like it looks cheap. It was also a decent weight to layer, not too heavy and very soft. I like to have several blanket options that I can use together or if some are in the laundry. This is not so heavy that I can’t wash it in my own washer and dryer, which is also really important. The only negative is that it does leave red fuzz on things, but after it is washed several more times that should dissipate. Overall, I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A blanket to help get a goods night sleep.
reviews.reviewText: The company sent me my blanket in a box that was marked the wrong color. It said it was Rose Pink when I ordered another color. I immediately put in a return for the wrong item and asked for a replacement.When I got to were I was going to tape the part of the box that ripped open during shipping and print out the shipping label to ship it back. I took the time to rip open the box a little more to peer inside the box to see if the blanket was the color I actually ordered. It turned out weirdly it was the color of the blanket I ordered. So I canceled the return and the replacement.When I opened the blanket when I got home it was so soft, thin, and nice feeling I was worried it could not keep me warm as I slept. As it turns out when I slept with it last night. I felt warm, covered even though it felt like the blanket was not there, and I could not feel my commercial fan blowing on me through the blanket(This surprised me due to how thin the blanket is). I had a wonderful night's sleep with it.This review is from only after having and using the blanket for one night. In the event something changes or the blanket does not last long. I will update the review with the new information and time owned.Shipping 4 out of 5 stars due to box label saying the blanket was not the correct color I ordered. They could of marked the box that the correct color was in it.Product 5 out of 5 stars due to it performing exactly how I expected it to perform.

I bought this as a gift for my mom - she was having a tough time finding a black blanket to go with her living room. This arrived on time and in great condition.The blanket is better than described. It is the perfect length if you are taller and despite being light it can keep you incredibly warm.It washes very well on regular and even after multiple washes it still looks and feels amazing. Overall this was an excellent purchase and I’d highly recommend it to anyone that likes soft and comfortable blankets.
Está cobija está súper cómoda! Excelente textura! Gran tamaño.. vale la pena la compra

very soft to the touch , quite warm , had one for nearly a year so I ordered another one. I have the red one and the color is vibrant , really look great too. Pretty much what you see in the pictures.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good, will order more as gifts!
reviews.reviewText: So soft, no shedding, color is PERFECT. My kids have already tried to steal this blanket several times. Will order some for my kids but I feel like this would also make a great secret santa gift...who doesn't like a cozy, fluffy blanket?
